attributes.action: abolish the iniquitous plans for a 'rubbish tax'  and spy cameras on personal refuse bins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the suggestion is true that this govt are planning to tax, YET AGAIN, Britains poor overburdened citizens for putting out too much, or the 'wrong kind' of rubbish, then we must ACT NOW. We are already paying unbelievably large amounts of council tax, which is meant to be covering the collection of our rubbish. How can the Govt justify charging us yet again for something they are already collecting taxes for? SIGN NOW before this tax slides in through the back door!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
